doc:
Sophie Marceau https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sophie_Marceau 0 Sophie Marceau (French: [sɔfi maʁso]; born Sophie Danièle Sylvie Maupu, 17 November 1966) is a French actress, director, screenwriter, and author. As a teenager, Marceau achieved popularity with her debut films La Boum (1980) and La Boum 2 (1982), receiving a César Award for Most Promising Actress. She became a film star in Europe with a string of successful films, including L'Étudiante (1988), Pacific Palisades (1990), Fanfan (1993), and Revenge of the Musketeers (1994). Marceau became an international film star with her performances in Braveheart (1995), Firelight (1997), and the 19th James Bond film The World Is Not Enough (1999). Sophie_Marceau ( French : [_sɔfi_maʁso ] ; born Sophie_Danièle_Sylvie_Maupu , 17_November_1966 ) is a_French_actress , director , screenwriter , and author . As a_teenager , Marceau achieved popularity with her_debut_films La_Boum_(_1980_) and La_Boum_2_(_1982_) , receiving a_César_Award for Most_Promising_Actress . She became a_film_star in Europe with a_string of successful_films , including L'Étudiante_(_1988_) , Pacific_Palisades_(_1990_) , Fanfan_(_1993_) , and Revenge of the_Musketeers_(_1994_) . Marceau became an_international_film_star with her_performances in Braveheart_(_1995_) , Firelight_(_1997_) , and the_19th_James_Bond_film The_World Is Not_Enough_(_1999_) .
